Privacy Policy

A Humble Beginning, and ongoing Journey üöÄ
Think and Drink Trivia was born out of a simple love for engaging the mind and enjoying good company. In 2008, Steve Steckroth, a full-time special education art teacher, planted the seed that would grow into a trivia sensation. His vision: to create a trivia experience that was as enjoyable for the casual enthusiast as it was for the dedicated trivia buff.
Where It All Started üìç
Our first trivia night took place 15 years ago at Two George‚Äôs Waterfront Grill in Boynton Beach. Back then, Steve donned the hat of the host, question writer, and event organizer‚Ä¶ Little did he know, this was the start of something extraordinary.
*not a tip bucket, it‚Äôs where players dropped their answer slips
The Growth Story üå±
As word spread about the fun atmosphere of Think and Drink Trivia nights, demand grew. Our trivia nights became places where friends could gather, where laughs were shared, and where minds were challenged.
Fast forward to today, and Think and Drink Trivia has blossomed into an enterprise hosting more than 70 games a week with the dedicated efforts of over 50 trivia hosts.
More Than Just Trivia üß°
But at its heart, Think and Drink Trivia is more than just questions and answers. It‚Äôs a community, it‚Äôs a night to look forward to, and it‚Äôs an experience that brings people together. Our questions range from history to pop culture, ensuring that everyone has a moment to shine.
Giving Back With Pride ‚ù§Ô∏è
We firmly believe in sharing our success with the community. We are proud to support Els for Autism, specifically The Learning Academy. Being associated with such incredible individuals has enriched our journey. They are doing remarkable things every single day, and we're honored to stand with them. If you're looking for a worthy cause, we wholeheartedly recommend considering them.
Check them out here!
Our Commitment to Quality üìù
We understand that trivia is a learning experience, and we take our questions very seriously. Our aim is to avoid overly-broad or inaccurate questions. Meticulous sourcing and referencing of all questions is part of our process. If you ever come across a question that doesn‚Äôt seem right, we want to hear from you! And if you‚Äôve got a great trivia question in mind, we‚Äôd love for you to share it with us.
Submit your questions here!
YOU(!) are Invited! üéâ
Whether you‚Äôre a trivia whiz or just looking for a night of fun, Think and Drink Trivia welcomes you. Come join us at one of our events and be a part of our story!
